response.overview: A film that only exists when we log it: a communal, recurring space to share screenings, recommendations, and riffs. Think of it as a faux “movie” that stages a conversation every night.
response.title: What's Everyone Watching Tonight?

titles.title: May the TMDb moderators find this charming, may they appreciate the absurdity, and may they approve it quickly so it can take its rightful place as the first communal “film” of its kind. To Betty White we pray, Amen.
